globalSummary: XRPL community spans 45K+ Discord members, active Reddit communities, and developer groups across all continents. XRPL Commons coordinates grants and events globally.

items.title: XRPL Commons announces Q1 2026 grant recipients
items.summary: 12 projects across DeFi, tooling, and education receive foundation grants totaling $2.4M.

items.title: XRPL Hackathon Tokyo draws 200+ developers
items.summary: Three-day hackathon in Tokyo produces 45 project submissions focused on EVM sidechain integration.

items.title: European XRPL meetup series kicks off in Amsterdam
items.summary: First of six European city meetups brings together developers, validators, and enthusiasts.

items.title: XLS-98 proposal enters final comment period
items.summary: Enhanced escrow conditions proposal nearing community consensus after 60-day discussion.

items.title: r/XRP surpasses 1.2M subscribers
items.summary: Main XRP subreddit continues growth with active daily discussions on ecosystem developments.

items.title: XRPL Developer Bootcamp online cohort begins
items.summary: Free 8-week online program teaches XRPL development to 500 registered participants globally.
